# Cosine

> Raised cosine distribution.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var cosine = require( '@stdlib/math/base/dist/cosine' );
```

#### cosine

Raised cosine distribution.

``` javascript
var dist = cosine;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
